<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets speed of <tt>CT_SLIDER</tt> or <tt>CT_XSLIDER</tt> with given idc of topmost user [[dialog]]. 
* Click to arrow - move by line
* Click to scale outside thumb - move by page. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sliderSetSpeed''' [idc,line,page] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc,line,page]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> line: [[Number]] value delta to move the slider when clicking on the outer arrows </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> page: [[Number]] value delta to move the slider when clicking inside the slider bar </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''sliderSetSpeed''' [line, page] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [line, page]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> line: [[Number]] value delta to move the slider when clicking on the outer arrows </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> page: [[Number]] value delta to move the slider when clicking inside the slider bar </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[sliderSetSpeed]] [101, 0.5, 2];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
